title: Grimy snapdragon

properties.name: description
properties.value: A grimy snapdragon is a herb that has not yet been cleaned to make a snapdragon. Grimy snapdragons may be grown from a snapdragon seed with a Farming level of 62, giving 98.5 experience for every snapdragon grown. Once planted, the herb takes 80 minutes to fully grow.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Grimy snapdragon
This article is about the grimy herb. For the cleaned herb, see Snapdragon.
 This article has money making guides: Cleaning grimy snapdragon, Farming snapdragon.
Please add tips to the subpages, rather than the article below.

Item ID3051

A grimy snapdragon is a herb that has not yet been cleaned to make a snapdragon. Grimy snapdragons may be grown from a snapdragon seed with a Farming level of 62, giving 98.5 experience for every snapdragon grown. Once planted, the herb takes 80 minutes to fully grow.

Cleaning a grimy snapdragon requires a Herblore level of 59 and gives 11.8 Herblore experience. Clean snapdragons are used to make super restore potions and sanfew serums with a Herblore level of 63 and 65 respectively.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 August 2020
(update)

Composting grimy snapdragon will now yield supercompost instead of regular compost.

9 March 2017
(update)

The item's value was increased from 1 to 21.

26 February 2015
(update)
  • The item was graphically updated to distinguish it from other grimy herbs.
  • The item was renamed from "Herb" to "Grimy snapdragon".
  • The item was made tradeable on the Trading Post/Grand Exchange.
  • The "Identify" option was changed to a "Clean" option.
25 February 2013
(update)
  • The item was renamed from "Grimy snapdragon" to "Herb".
  • The "Clean" option was changed to an "Identify" option.
22 February 2013
(update)
  • The item was renamed from "Herb" to "Grimy snapdragon".
  • The "Identify" option was changed to a "Clean" option.
11 July 2005
(update)

The item was made obtainable as part of the Farming skill.

27 July 2004
(update)

The item was added to the game cache, but was unobtainable as the Agility arena only gave clean herbs.

present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Grimy snapdragons are one of the five herbs that cannot be obtained from the Sorceress's Garden minigame.
